trafficsimulator.simulator.interfaces

Interface VehicleGenerationControl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VehicleGenerationControlImpl

    public interface VehicleGenerationControl
    Interface responsible for controlling vehicle operations from the simulation control
    Author:
    z003ru0y

      • setVehicleGenerationRate

        void setVehicleGenerationRate(int genMod)
        Changes the generation rate of new vehicles
        Parameters:
        genMod - rate of vehicles generated

      • dispatchEmergencyVehicle

        void dispatchEmergencyVehicle(int simulationTime)
                       throws TraciException
        Sends a emergency vehicle to the simulation
        Parameters:
        simulationTime - time when to dispatch the vehicle
        Throws:
        TraciException - when some of the traci calls fails

      • generateVehicles

        java.util.List<JsonVehicle> generateVehicles(int simulationTime,
                                             StatisticsControl statistics,
                                             int visualizationMultiplier)
                                      throws TraciException
        Generate vehicles for the current simulation step and returns their basic information
        Parameters:
        simulationTime - when to insert the vehicles
        statistics - output parameter to gather statistical data
        visualizationMultiplier - multiplier for vehicle dimensions
        Returns:
        list of objects containing information about newly added vehicles
        Throws:
        TraciException - when some of the traci calls fails
